===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[be called]]
#: {{zh-x|你 叫 什麼 名字？|What is your name?}}
#* {{zh-x|這 叫 什麼？|How do you '''call''' this? / What '''is it called'''?}}
# to [[call]]; to [[name]]
#* {{zh-x|我們 經常 叫 他 的 綽號。|We often '''call''' him by his nickname.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 可以 叫 他 ^@戴夫 嗎？|May I '''call''' him Dave?}}
# to [[call]] (someone)
#: {{zh-x|叫 警察|to call the police}}
#* {{zh-x|要是 需要 什麼，我 就 叫 你。|I' ll '''call''' you if anything is needed.}}
# to [[cry]]; to [[shout]]
#: {{zh-x|狗叫|bark}}
#* {{zh-x|她 高興 地 叫 起來，投入 了 她 母親 的 懷抱。|With a '''cry''' of joy, she fell into her mother's arms.}}
# to [[hail]]; to [[greet]]
# to [[ask]]; to [[order]]
#* {{zh-x|叫 他 待 在 家裡。|'''Ask''' her to stay home.}}
#* {{zh-x|醫生 叫 他 休息 幾 天。|The doctor '''told''' him to lay off a couple of days.}}
# to [[hire]]; to [[call]] (a taxi); to [[order]] (in a restaurant, in a shop)
#* {{zh-x|我 給 你 叫 什麼 菜？ 肉排 還是 魚？|What shall I '''order''' for you? Steak or fish?}}
# {{n-g|used in a passive sentence to introduce the agent}}; [[by]]
#* {{zh-x|莊稼 叫 大水 沖 走 了。|The crops were washed away '''by''' the flood.}}

====Usage notes====
* {{sense|to call, to be called}} When used for a person, {{lang|zh|叫}} is generally followed by one's given name or full name, as in English.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|to be called}} {{zh-l|姓|to be surnamed}}
* {{sense|to order a dish}} {{zh-l|點}}
